title: Fix and run the Memory MCP Server
description: Resolve the module resolution issues with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk and get the Memory MCP Server running with the project tagging system implemented.

title: Examine the SDK package structure
description: Investigate the @modelcontextprotocol/sdk package structure to understand how it should be properly imported and used.

title: Create a test script for SDK imports
description: Create a simple test script that attempts different ways of importing the SDK to identify the correct approach.

title: Try running the original index.ts file
description: Attempt to run the original index.ts file directly, as it might have the correct import structure for the SDK.

title: Update the original index.ts file to use the modular components
description: Modify the root index.ts file to use our updated KnowledgeGraphManager with the project tagging system.

title: Run the server with the project tagging system
description: Run the Memory MCP Server with the project tagging system implemented to verify it's working correctly.

title: Create a test script for the project tagging system
description: Create a simple test script to verify that the project tagging system works correctly by creating test entities and relations, then querying them by project tag.
